name: Adrift Spaceship
description:
!!SLIGHT HORROR WARNING KINDA? ALSO JUMPSCARE WARNING!!

Also, refresh the tab after each playthrough please, I forgot to reset the meteor spawn rates after every playthrough. Game is somewhat unbalanced as well.

Drifting through space for weeks, your desperation leads you to an asteroid belt for food, contact, or anything. You've been isolated for weeks from your team, and you need to get back now or die trying.

Controls/How To Play:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Shoot, move it to aim

Shoot asteroids, get repair packets.

Credits:

Art: Kenney

Misc SFX: freesound.org (all licensed under CC0, but if you want credit for something you made here contact me)
